# MSCriticalMessagingAuthorizationStatus.denied

**Case**

A person has denied permission to use the Critical Messaging API.

## Declaration

```swift
case denied
```

## Discussion

The framework returns this value when someone explicitly denies a request to use the  API.

## Authorization statuses

- **MSCriticalMessagingAuthorizationStatus.unknown**: The authorization status is unknown.
- **MSCriticalMessagingAuthorizationStatus.approved**: A person has approved a request to use the Critical Messaging API.
